name: Dwarves & Cathedrals
description:
Control an army of tiny dwarves... ...and help them build their dream cathedral Build a village to gather precious resources , defend against demonic creatures and much more... Combat the plague, evil villains, and keep the faith of your army alive at all cost, or else chaos will unleash

A game made by Noa & Liam Calice from Blackthornprod

Blackthornprod - YouTube
